Address: 949 SOUTH COAST DRIVE THIRD FLOOR, COSTA MESA, California, 92626, United States of America
CompanyDescription: Pacific Mercantile Bancorp is a California corporation that owns 100% of the stock of Pacific Mercantile Bank, a California state chartered commercial bank (which, for convenience, will sometimes be referred to in this Report as the "Bank"). The capital stock of the Bank is our principal asset and substantially all of our business operations are conducted and substantially all of our assets are owned by the Bank which, as a result, accounts for substantially all of our revenues, expenses and income. As the owner of a commercial bank, Pacific Mercantile Bancorp is registered as a bank holding company under the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956, as amended (the "Bank Holding Company Act"), and, as such, our operations are regulated by the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System (the "Federal Reserve Board" or the "FRB") and the Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco ("FRBSF") under delegated authority from the FRB.  ...
